channel.title: R on Jared Monger
channel.description: Recent content in R on Jared Monger

item.title: R for SAS and SPSS Users, A Review
item.description: If you’ve followed me for any length of time, you’ll know that I’m a proponent of good data analysis. I was not formally educated as a programmer but I’ve found a solid understanding of data manipulation has served me well in my work as an accountant. My primary tool for 4 years has been SAS. It is an awesome, easy to learn language that has allowed me to look like a hero on numerous projects.
